name: Twinkle☆Guardians
description:
Twinkle☆Guardians is
a tower defense game about about 10 guardians who protect crystals.

Anyway, It's Simple!

But it's a bit challenging!

Defend the crystal from a large number of demons and become a legendary guardian!



・35 stages
・14 different towers with 10 characters and 4 objects (gradually join)
・WAVE rewind function that allows you to go back to your favorite point even if you fail.
・Powerful items that can be dropped from enemies and obtained in mini-games
(difficulty level that can be cleared without using them)
